data.system_settings: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS, Asus Netbook F551C, Intel Core i3 64bits
data.actual_result: You are still jumped to the old message you selected previously, like if it didn't remember that you clicked "Jump to present".
data.expected_result: You should be placed at the recent messages in the channel you were in
data.short_description: App doesn't remember the "Jump to present" action after switching language
data.steps_to_repro: - Search for a message, or open recent mentions in the current server. - Pick any old message and click "Jump" - After you have successfully jumped, click "Jump to present" to return to recent messages - Open Settings and then switch to any other language - Wait for Discord to reload and look at the chat
